name: Bellatto - Knockaround - Gordo
additionalNotes: Knockaround is noticeably less expensive than the other Bellatto-branded cigars debuting at the trade show, and that’s intentional. Knockaround is meant to be an every day cigar and is one of the rare releases that comes in a box where all the sizes are priced under $10. Comes with Ecuador Connecticut Shade wrapper, Indonesian Sumatra binder and Dominican Republic (HVA), Nicaragua (Criollo) & U.S.A. (Pennsylvania) fillers.
